item.title: HTB Flight
item.author: 253567768@qq.com (Wuvoun)
item.description:
HTB Flight

Author: Wuvoun(253567768@qq.com)

HTB-Flight

信息搜集

fscan和nmap扫描

fscan -h 10.10.11.187

   ___                              _    
  / _ \     ___  ___ _ __ __ _  ___| | __ 
 / /_\/____/ __|/ __| '__/ _` |/ __| |/ /
/ /_\\_____\__ \ (__| | | (_| | (__|   <    
\____/     |___/\___|_|  \__,_|\___|_|\_\

start infoscan
10.10.11.187:88 open
10.10.11.187:445 open
10.10.11.187:135 open
10.10.11.187:80 open
10.10.11.187:139 open
[*] alive ports len is: 5
start vulscan
[*] WebTitle http://10.10.11.187       code:200 len:7069   title:g0 Aviation
已完成 5/5
[*] 扫描结束,耗时: 1m25.470519979s

nmap -p $ports $ip -sV

爆破WEB子域名,发现 school和 huangguankaihura 两个子域名

Published on 2025-09-20 at Wuvoun, last modified on 2025-09-20
